original_title: Detention orders issued on 11 suspects arrested with 65kg heroin
original_body_lines: The Fort Magistrate’s Court has issued detention orders on the 11 suspects apprehended by the Sri Lanka Navy in two trawlers while in the possession of 65 kilograms of heroin off the Southern coast.
Accordingly, the court granted permission for the suspects to be detained for 07 days by the Police Narcotics Bureau (PNB) for further interrogation.
